wordGroup: archaeological site 考古遗址；遗迹

sentences.en: These archaeological findings are part of the national patrimony.
sentences.cn: 这些考古发现属于国家文物。

sentences.en: On that issue, Hunt and Lipo say, archaeological evidence backs up Rapanui folklore.
sentences.cn: 关于这个问题，亨特和利普说，考古证据支持了拉帕努伊的民间传说。

sentences.en: The work fills (in) a gap which has hitherto existed in our archaeological literature.
sentences.cn: 这部著作填补了我国考古学文献中的一个空白。
